title: Ubisoft is adding Denuvo to previously unprotected games
body:
You could wonder, why there no updated repacks for Anno 2205 or Heroes 7 yet.

The answer is simple – Ubisoft now releases updates for old games with Denuvo. Yep, that’s right. No more Ubisoft games and repacks from now on (until Denuvo will be properly cracked, of course).

Update: In Uplay an updated Heroes VII version goes WITHOUT DENUVO. WHAT. THE. FUCK. is in the heads of Ubisoft, huh?. The game is not updated in Uplay, so it will have Denuvo most def.
